page.title: 10GREENLOANING SCHOOL
page.content: Greenloaning School is one of Taysides 14% of rural schools. The school has 2 teachers and 33 pupils at present. One class is for Primary 1,2 &3 and there are 9 girls & 6 boys aged between 4and a half &7here.In the other class P4,5, 6&7 are 7 girls &11 boys between 8 & 11 years old. The pupils go either to Crieff High or Morrison's Academy when they leave Greenloaning on completion of Primary 7. All the normal primary school subjects are taught, language, maths,environmental studies,art,music, crafts,R.E,P.E,and health. A music teacher& a remedial teacher come once a week and Advisory teachers of Craft, P.E & Art visit the school monthly. School meals are brought daily from Auchterarder High School Kitchen and an average of 10 pupils have these. The remainder bring packed lunches which they eat in the dining/GP room.
